text: Could our @MattHancock @PHE_uk #ACMP @CMO_England @FPH @NHSuk @TheBMA @theDA_UK @MHRAgovuk @MalariaJournal @LSTMnews @TropMedOxford @HTropDis clarify this?Does the Quinoline Drug,#chloroquine #hydrochloroquine have any comparison to #Mefloquine(#Lariam) antimalaria drugs?#COVID19 https://t.co/OwI8aUInpd https://t.co/taizuuwy5w
